template.label: Applet Class
template.description: Creates a new AWT (Abstract Window Toolkit) applet. An applet is a Java class that can run in any Java-enabled browser.

template.label: Empty Java File
template.description: Creates a new empty Java file.

template.label: Exception Class
template.description: Creates a new Exception class with an optional detailed message.

template.label: Java Enum
template.description: Creates a new Java Enum file. To be able to use enum files, your project must use JDK 5.0 or compatible.

template.label: Main Class
template.description: Creates a new Java class with a main method permitting it to be run as a console application.
